triaged_issues.title: [FR] Only search for missing songs from artists with a given tag
triaged_issues.recommendation: Highly feasible feature request. Lidarr API fully supports tags. ~15 lines of code to implement.
triaged_issues.actions_taken: Posted comprehensive technical analysis with implementation details and code examples.

triaged_issues.title: Who's this guy?
triaged_issues.recommendation: Question already answered by repo owner. Issue closed.
triaged_issues.actions_taken: Posted closing comment and closed issue as completed.

triaged_issues.title: Got this message after trying to enable it (Gnome45):
triaged_issues.recommendation: Extension needs migration from legacy imports to ES modules for GNOME 45+. 16 files, ~600 lines to modify. Soup 2→3 migration also required.
triaged_issues.actions_taken: Posted detailed migration roadmap with code examples and offered to perform the work.

triaged_issues.title: Stuck?
triaged_issues.recommendation: Process hanging due to missing HTTP timeouts, YouTube rate limiting, or yt-dlp subprocess blocking.
triaged_issues.actions_taken: Posted comprehensive diagnostic steps with specific code locations and debugging procedures.

triaged_issues.title: Questions : difference between Uploaded and session_uploaded and Enhancement for already downloaded file.
triaged_issues.recommendation: Question answered by owner with manual workaround. Enhancement request is feasible with 3 implementation options provided.
triaged_issues.actions_taken: Posted technical analysis with code sketch for CLI flag implementation and offered to open PR.

triaged_issues.title: Chrome Web Store publish failing since August 2025
triaged_issues.recommendation: Verify Chrome Web Store OAuth credentials and update chrome-webstore-upload-cli
